content: experience instant warmth with this supremely comfortable crochet blanket featured in both bernat blanket and bernat all in one blanket granny square you ll do granny square double_crochet chain and slip_stitch seaming with 2 different color combinations to choose from this blanket is sure to add a bright pop of color to the family room bedroom or your favorite quiet spot materials version 1 bernat® blanket™ 10 5 oz/300 g 220 yds/201 m main color mc vintage white 10006 1 ball or 215 yds/197 m bernat® all in one™ blanket granny™ 8 5 oz/240 g 178 yds/163 m contrast a retro pop 65004 3 balls or 9 squares contrast b throwback 65003 2 balls or 8 squares contrast c seaside shine 65005 2 balls or 8 squares note 1 ball will make 4 granny squares
